snippet: A conversation with Ed Snider, who co-founded the Philadelphia Flyers in 1967 and has owned or run the team ever since.
abstract: A conversation with Ed Snider, who co-founded the Philadelphia Flyers in 1967 and has owned or run the team ever since.
lead_paragraph: Ed Snider co-founded the Philadelphia Flyers in 1967 and has owned or run the team ever since. Today, as chairman of Comcast Spectacor, the company that owns the Philadelphia Flyers, he is perhaps the most powerful man in the game, as outlined in this Dec. 31 New York Times article.

headline.main: Q. and A. With Ed Snider: Philadelphia Hockey's Heart and Soul
